embed_description:
**Application Rules**

**1.** Edit must be at least 10 seconds not including loops.
**2.** Please do not app with something from 2 months ago or more.
**3.** Collabs, remakes are not allowed.
**4.** One apps per day.


The static members will give you the following Results and the Owner will give you the official or final result of your edit below.

**Accept** - It means that you are accepted and become a member in STATIC.

**Trial** - This means that in the trial version you are given a maximum of a month so that you can get out of the trial version.

**Reapp** - Re-apply with better work.

**Decline** - This means that after a while you can add a new edit and try again

questions.question: Why do you want to join Static Squad?
questions.placeholder: ex. Meet more people and expand my editing style and improve editing skills
